Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting employment discrimination based on an individual's actual or perceived status as a caregiver
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting employment discrimination based on an individual’s actual or perceived status as a caregiver.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, to require covered entities to engage in a cooperative dialogue with persons who are or may be entitled to reasonable accommodations
Items.MatterName: Require covered entities to engage in a cooperative dialogue with persons who are or may be entitled to reasonable accommodations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding the protections of the city of New York human rights law with regard to public accommodations, and making certain technical corrections
Items.MatterName: Expanding the protections of the city of NY human rights law with regard to public accommodations, and making certain technical corrections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to construction of the New York city human rights law
Items.MatterName: Construction of the New York city human rights law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to protecting the right to truthful information under the city human rights law and expressly providing a cause of action for employers and principals whose rights are violated by conduct to which their employees or agents are subjected
Items.MatterName: Protecting the right to truthful information under the city human rights law and expressly providing a cause of action for employers and principals whose rights are violated by conduct to which their employees or agents are subjected.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the Commission on Human Rights to evaluate its tracking system, and develop a formal policy and procedure to handle complaints concerning human rights violations
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Commission on Human Rights to evaluate its tracking system, and develop a formal policy and procedure to handle complaints concerning human rights violations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to clarifying the definition of “place or provider of public accommodation” in the city human rights law
Items.MatterName: Clarifying the definition of “place or provider of public accommodation” in the city human rights law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of attorney’s fees under the city human rights law
Items.MatterName: Provision of attorney’s fees under the city human rights law

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the repeal of subdivision 16 of section 8-107 of such code relating to the applicability of provisions of the human rights law regarding sexual orientation
Items.MatterName: Repeal of subdivision 16 of section 8-107 of such code relating to the applicability of provisions of the human rights law regarding sexual orientation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding the definition of employer under the human rights law to provide protections for domestic workers
Items.MatterName: Expanding the definition of employer under the human rights law to provide protections for domestic workers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding the prohibition against source of income discrimination in housing accommodations
Items.MatterName: Expanding the prohibition against source of income discrimination in housing accommodations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting discrimination in housing accommodations on the basis of an individual’s status as a victim of domestic violence.
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting discrimination in housing accommodations on the basis of an individual’s status as a victim of domestic violence.
